===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|usually of animals}} [[male]]
# [[masculine]]; [[powerful]]; [[grand]]
# [[powerful]] or [[influential]] [[person]] or [[state]]

====Usage notes====
* Commonly used for animals to mean “male” in academic contexts, less commonly used in non-academic contexts (use {{zh-l|*公}} instead), and not used for humans (use {{zh-l|*男}} instead). For example:
*: {{zh-x|雄雞|cock}}
*: {{zh-x|雄牛|bull}}

====Antonyms====
* {{zh-l|雌|female}}

==Japanese==

===Kanji===
{{ja-kanji|grade=c|rs=隹04}}

====Readings====
{{ja-readings
|goon=[[う]] (u), [[ゆ]] (yu)
|kanon=[[ゆう]] (yū)
|kun=[[おす]] (osu), [[お]] (o)
|nanori=[[かつ]] (katsu), [[たけ]] (take), [[つよし]] (tsuyoshi), [[ゆ]] (yu), [[よう]] (yō)
}}

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|ゆう}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ゆう}} {{m|zh|雄|tr=hjuwng||male}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|ゆう|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ゆう}}

# [[male]]
# something or someone [[excellent]] {{qualifier|male}}
#: {{ja-usex|一世の'''雄'''|いっせい の '''ゆう'''|one of the '''greatest men''' of his generation}}

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|雄偉|ゆうい}}: [[heroic]], [[grand]], [[excellent]]
* {{ja-r|雄黄|ゆうおう}}: [[orpiment]], an [[arsenic]] [[sulfide]] [[mineral]]
* {{ja-r|雄花|ゆうか}}: a [[male]] [[flower]]
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|お}}
{{IPAchar|/wo/}} → {{IPAchar|/o/}}

From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=お}}. Persists in compounds, such as the first element ''o-'' in the modern Japanese term {{m|ja|男|tr=otoko||man}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|お|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|男}}, {{ja-l|牡}}, {{ja-l|夫}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|お|hhira=を}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=お|obsolete|_|in isolation}} [[man]], [[male]]
#* {{RQ:Kojiki|{{lang|ja|上巻}} [''Kamitsumaki'']}}
#*: {{ja-usex|汝こそは'''遠'''にいませば|な こそ は '''を''' に いませば|As you yourself be '''male''' / '''a man'''...}}
# {{lb|ja|sort=お|obsolete}} [[husband]]
#* {{RQ:Kojiki|{{lang|ja|上巻}} [''Kamitsumaki'']}}
#*: {{ja-usex|吾はもよ女にしあれば汝を除て'''男'''は無し汝を除て夫は無し|わ は もよ め に しあれば な を きて '''を''' は なし な を きて つま は なし|As I am a woman, without you, there are no '''husbands'''. Without you, there are no wives...}}
# something [[large]], [[powerful]], or otherwise [[masculine]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''雄'''叫び／'''雄'''滝／大'''夫'''|'''お'''たけび／'''お'''だき／ますら'''お'''|a [[war cry]] / the [[larger]] of two [[waterfall]]s / [[manliness]]}}
# [[yang]] {{qualifier|as opposed to [[yin]]}}
#: {{ja-usex|女'''男'''、陰'''陽'''|め'''お'''、 め'''お'''|[[yin-yang]] (two different kanji spellings, same reading and derivation)}}

=====Usage notes=====
Not used in isolation in modern Japanese.

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|雄臼|お.うす}}: in a traditional Japanese stone or wooden mill or grinder, the bottom of the two pieces, two which the drive shaft is attached
* {{ja-r|雄鹿|おじか}}: a [[buck]], a [[male]] [[deer]]
* {{ja-r|雄滝|おだき}}: the [[larger]] of two [[waterfall]]s
* {{ja-r|雄叫び|おたけび}}: a [[war cry]]
* {{ja-r|男|おとこ}}: [[man]]
* {{ja-r|夫|おっと}}: [[husband]]
* {{ja-r|雄花|おばな}}: a [[male]] [[flower]]
* {{ja-r|須佐之男|^すさのお}}: [[Susanoo]], the male god of storms
* {{ja-l|益荒男}}, {{ja-l|丈夫}}, {{ja-r|大夫|ますらお}}: [[manliness]]
* {{ja-l|女男}}, {{ja-r|陰陽|めお}}: [[yin-yang]]
{{der-bottom}}

=====Antonyms=====
* {{ja-r|雌|め}}: [[woman]], [[female]]

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|おす}}
{{IPAchar|/wosu/}} → {{IPAchar|/osu/}}

Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=おす|雄|tr1=o|t1=male|す|tr2=su}}, but the derivation of the ''su'' element is unknown.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|おす|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|牡}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|おす|オス|hhira=をす}}

# [[male]]

=====Usage notes=====
This is the most common reading of this term in modern Japanese when used as a standalone noun.

Only used to refer to [[non-human]] male organisms. {{U:ja:biology|オス}}

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|human male}} {{ja-r|男性|だんせい}}

====Antonyms====
* {{sense|non-human female}} {{ja-r|雌|めす}}, {{ja-r|メス}}
* {{sense|human female}} {{ja-r|女性|じょせい}}

===Etymology 4===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|おん}}
{{IPAchar|/won/}} → {{IPAchar|/on/}}

Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=おん|雄|tr1=o|t1=male|ん|tr2=n}}. The latter ''-n'' element might be a contraction of the possessive particle {{m|ja|の|tr=no}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|おん|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|牡}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|おん|hhira=をん}}

# [[male]]

=====Usage notes=====
Not used in isolation in modern Japanese.

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-l|雄鳥}}, {{ja-r|雄鶏|おんどり}}: a [[male]] [[chicken]] → a [[rooster]], a [[cock]]
{{der-bottom}}
